description: Founders and & Frens Happy Hour hosted by DCENTRAL x Preferences AI x Mindfulness Capital After last year's event, we're at it again with another fun get together. No speakers, no VIP lists, just the best craft beer in Hong Kong together with builders and frens you actually want to hang out with. A hidden gem in the cool hipster haunt of POHO, join us at CRAFTISSIMO in Sheung Wan for craft beer vibes on Wednesday, February 11th from 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM. After the frenzy of Consensus Hong Kong, here's your chance to check out a very historical, charming neighbourhood in Hong Kong PLUS mingle with fellow crypto enthusiasts, share stories, and maybe even hatch your next big idea over a cold brew or two. Enjoy 10% off the best beer from local Hong Kong breweries and niche beers from around the world. So grab your friends, bring your best vibes, and see you there! *** DCENTRAL has been supporting and building Web3 communities since 2019 and is a community-based, multi-chain Web3 and crypto events brand and facilitator. Through flagship conferences, meetups and workshops around the world, DCENTRAL connects builders, investors, companies, educators, and enthusiasts shaping the future of Web3 and crypto. Preferences AI provides a data layer for consumer preferences that combines real-time human feedback with advanced AI agents to deliver instant, actionable market research insights.
